text: First MicroFinance Bank-Afghanistan (FMFB-A) is a banking and loan institution of Aga Khan Agency for Microfinance which provides micro loans to poor and vulnerable population, particularly women. The Bank was established in 2004. == References == == See also == * First MicroFinance Bank-Tajikistan * First MicroFinance Bank-Pakistan == External links == * Category:Banks of Afghanistan Category:Aga Khan Development Network Category:Microfinance companies of Asia Category:Microfinance banks Category:Banks established in 2004
title: First MicroFinance Bank (Afghanistan)
